== Sernabatim (626905) ==

Sernabatim is a village in the [[Salcete]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 184 hectares and harbouring 372 households with total population of 1548 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 5 km. Male population is 707 and female population is 841. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the village is 626905<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
